frontmatter.title: Nginx auth_request
frontmatter.description: If you limit the access to your services/web pages with an external auth service, you can do that with Nginx auth_request.

frontmatter.title: Intro: Talking to your database with Hasura
frontmatter.description: So you need a backend to talk to your database and return the data to your web clients. Instead of building the API service yourself, there's a simpler and quicker solution: Hasura
